mapper.sql: id, owner, source, customer_id, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts (id, owner, source, customer_id, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tbl_contacts
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_contacts set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts(id, owner, source, customer_id, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, create_by,create_time,description, contact_summary, next_contact_time,address) values (#{id},#{owner},#{source},#{customerId},#{fullname},#{appellation},#{email},#{mphone},#{job},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{description},#{contactSummary},#{nextContactTime},#{address})
mapper.select: select c.fullname,c.email,c.mphone,c.id from tbl_contacts c where c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'

select count(*) from tbl_contacts co join tbl_user u1 on u1.id=co.owner left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=co.source join tbl_customer c on c.id=co.customer_id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on dv2.id=co.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id=co.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id=co.edit_by
and u1.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and co.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and co.customer_id like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and co.source = #{source}

select co.id,u1.name as owner,dv1.value as source,c.name as customer_id,co.fullname,co.appellation, co.email,co.mphone,co.job,u2.name as create_by,co.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,co.edit_time,co.description, co.contact_summary,co.next_contact_time,co.address from tbl_contacts co join tbl_user u1 on u1.id=co.owner left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=co.source join tbl_customer c on c.id=co.customer_id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on dv2.id=co.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id=co.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id=co.edit_by where co.id=#{id}

select co.id,u1.name as owner,dv1.value as source,c.name as customer_id,co.fullname,dv2.value as appellation, co.email,co.mphone,co.job,u2.name as create_by,co.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,co.edit_time,co.description, co.contact_summary,co.next_contact_time,co.address from tbl_contacts co join tbl_user u1 on u1.id=co.owner left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on dv1.id=co.source join tbl_customer c on c.id=co.customer_id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on dv2.id=co.appellation join tbl_user u2 on u2.id=co.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id=co.edit_by where co.id=#{id}
